#!/bin/bash
# Totally written by sheagcraig... just cut up for a Munki nopkg .plist # Original code at https://github.com/sheagcraig/guestAccount/blob/master/guest_account # Taking out all the if/then stuff, because we aren't running anything close to Lion on campus
# Does guest already exist? if [ -f /var/db/dslocal/nodes/Default/users/Guest.plist ]; then # /bin/echo "Guest already created!" exit 1
else # Guest not created exit 0
fi

#!/bin/bash
# Totally written by sheagcraig... just cut up for a Munki nopkg .plist # Original code at https://github.com/sheagcraig/guestAccount/blob/master/guest_account # Taking out all the if/then stuff, because we aren't running anything close to Lion on campus
/usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest dsAttrTypeNative:_defaultLanguage en /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest dsAttrTypeNative:_guest true /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest dsAttrTypeNative:_writers__defaultLanguage Guest /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest dsAttrTypeNative:_writers__LinkedIdentity Guest /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest dsAttrTypeNative:_writers__UserCertificate Guest /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest AuthenticationHint '' /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest NFSHomeDirectory /Users/Guest
# Give a little extra time for the password and kerberos to play nicely sleep 2 /usr/bin/dscl . -passwd /Users/Guest '' sleep 2
/usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest Picture "/System/Library/CoreServices/CoreTypes.bundle/Contents/Resources/UserIcon.icns" /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest PrimaryGroupID 201 /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest RealName "Guest User" /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest RecordName Guest /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest UniqueID 201 /usr/bin/dscl . -create /Users/Guest UserShell /bin/bash # Commenting out, because this line causes a keychain error when logging in # The side effect of commenting out is that you have to enter an empty password (just hit Enter) instead of clicking the icon # and then just logging in right away # Full credit for that workaround to https://jamfnation.jamfsoftware.com/discussion.html?id=9737#responseChild80750 #/usr/bin/security add-generic-password -a Guest -s com.apple.loginwindow.guest-account -D "application password" /Library/Keychains/System.keychain
# This seems to be technically unnecessary; it controls whether the "Allow # guests to log in to this computer" checkbox is enabled in SysPrefs /usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow GuestEnabled -bool TRUE

#!/bin/bash
# Totally written by sheagcraig... just cut up for a Munki nopkg .plist # Original code at https://github.com/sheagcraig/guestAccount/blob/master/guest_account # Taking out all the if/then stuff, because we aren't running anything close to Lion on campus
/usr/bin/dscl . -delete /Users/Guest /usr/bin/security delete-generic-password -a Guest -s com.apple.loginwindow.guest-account -D "application password" /Library/Keychains/System.keychain
# Also-do we need this still? (Should un-tick the box) /usr/bin/defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow GuestEnabled -bool FALSE
